snippet: Followers of a sultan seeking to re-establish a historic claim over part of Borneo Island have been under attack by Malaysian forces.
abstract: Malaysian authorities announce that they have detained 79 people they suspect of being sympathizers of Filipino fighters who recently landed on Borneo in an attempt to re-establish a historic claim to part of the island; government also raises the death toll in fighting between Malaysian forces and the militants to 61.
lead_paragraph: Followers of a sultan seeking to re-establish a historic claim over part of Borneo Island have been under attack by Malaysian forces.

headline.seo: Malaysia Detains 79 in Fight Against Filipinos
headline.main: Malaysia Detains 79 in Fight Against Filipinos
headline.print_headline: Malaysia Detains 79 in Fight Against Filipinos
